channel.title: Web Developer Wanted!
channel.description: Hey so I launched a project of mine, and it's coming together alright. I'm focusing more on getting new content / skills, and everything together. I can web develope myself, but I'd be easier to have a set of extra hands working on the website, while I bang-out the server. If you want more information cus this isn't much shoot me a PM, I'll reply asap, I will accept anyone who can make a clean professional appearance, even if their not that good. If it's clean I'll take you. Thanks

item.title: Web Developer Wanted!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I shall develop said website. You must first complete three challenges however.

[ol][li]Obtain the blood of 3 virgin Antarcticans[/li]
[li]A sample of Kim Jong Un’s hair[/li]
[li]Find Tom’s personality[/li][/ol]

If you manage to succeed, I will truly be in your debt.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Developer Wanted!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Planet X, post:4, topic:550004”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=668881.msg4473244#msg4473244 date=1424304823]
Beggars can’t be choosers!
[/quote]
Who’s begging? I’m looking for someone to fill a position. This isn’t a one time thing, should of noted that. They’ll ALSO be paid, for all the work they do, but I didn’t state that because it’s against MOPAR rules.[/quote]Hah, yeah I can’t take a joke either.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Developer Wanted!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Planet X, post:11, topic:550004”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=668881.msg4473452#msg4473452 date=1424435545]

This is web dev section. ^^ It’s where it’s suppose to be.

I started out modding this board, I can guarantee you it’s not supposed to be in here you little arrogant shit.
[/quote]
It’s fine, and I can guarantee I know why you lost your privileges too lol.[/quote]
I didn’t lose my privileges, I resigned. If you get removed you don’t get the ex-staff award. Don’t try and tell me your post goes in a board when it doesn’t and don’t try and tell me you know something you don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Developer Wanted!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Planet X, post:4, topic:550004”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=668881.msg4473244#msg4473244 date=1424304823]
Beggars can’t be choosers!
[/quote]
Who’s begging? I’m looking for someone to fill a position. This isn’t a one time thing, should of noted that. They’ll ALSO be paid, for all the work they do, but I didn’t state that because it’s against MOPAR rules.

… someone has name changes lol
ill do it if i get paid… add my skype if your in anyway interested : legitareus

Who changed their name? Sure wasn’t me. Obviously… You’ll need to be paid for the facts;

  • You’ll be hosting the website
  • You’ll be making the website
  • You’ll need money for a REAL domain and webhost, not some bullshit.
    Skype isn’t setup currently, working on it but real busy.
    Msg me and I’ll shoot u my skype info when I have it made.

You could start by posting in the right board.

Requesting developers and half assed programmers like this fine site offers is all done through the Development Teams board. Someone who was as “famous” as you were in the “RSPS scene” should know that.

This is web design / DEVELOPEMENT section, this is about WEB DESIGN AND DEVELOPEMENT. It can go through either one, but makes more sense being is the web design / developement section rather than the most common Java developers everyone tries to get.[/quote]
Still the wrong board, building a development team is done through the development teams board. Doesn’t matter what your opinion is, that’s where it’s meant to go.

Read full topic

Beggars can’t be choosers!

Who’s begging? I’m looking for someone to fill a position. This isn’t a one time thing, should of noted that. They’ll ALSO be paid, for all the work they do, but I didn’t state that because it’s against MOPAR rules.

[quote=“Differences, post:1, topic:550018”]… someone has name changes lol
ill do it if i get paid… add my skype if your in anyway interested : legitareus[/quote]
Who changed their name? Sure wasn’t me. Obviously… You’ll need to be paid for the facts;

  • You’ll be hosting the website
  • You’ll be making the website
  • You’ll need money for a REAL domain and webhost, not some bullshit.
    Skype isn’t setup currently, working on it but real busy.
    Msg me and I’ll shoot u my skype info when I have it made.

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:550004”]You could start by posting in the right board.

Requesting developers and half assed programmers like this fine site offers is all done through the Development Teams board. Someone who was as “famous” as you were in the “RSPS scene” should know that.[/quote]
This is web design / DEVELOPEMENT section, this is about WEB DESIGN AND DEVELOPEMENT. It can go through either one, but makes more sense being is the web design / developement section rather than the most common Java developers everyone tries to get.

Read full topic
